story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_0100_10: Volo, I’m going to just ask straight out.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_0200_10:
Did you cause the space-time rift on Pasio?
Did you make the sync stones ultimate appear?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_0400_10:
That’s what I wish I could say, but none of that
was my doing.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_0500_10:
Back in Hisui, I was able to take advantage of
Dialga, Palkia, and Giratina’s power.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_0600_10:
However, it seems I’m not able to do the same
here on Pasio.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_0700_10:
Given that, wouldn’t you agree that my options
are limited?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_0800_10:
In other words, the strange events happening now
are purely driven by Arceus’s will!
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_0900_10: And I heard Arceus's voice! Which means...
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_1100_10:
It seems like Arceus didn’t choose you in the end
either, eh?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_1300_10: Savoring the silence, are we? Very well, then.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_1400_10: Rei, I won’t let this opportunity escape me.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_1500_10:
This time, I’ll be the victor! I’ll wield the power
of Arceus!
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_1600_10:
So...you still haven’t given up on using Arceus's
power to make the world the way you want it?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_1800_10: Unfortunately, you and I have conflicting views.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_1900_10:
Do as you please. Perhaps try to stop me by
exposing my motives to the people of this land?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_2100_10:
You know what? I won’t tell anyone about your
true motives.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_2400_10:
But even if I got everyone to try to stop you by
force, you still wouldn’t give up.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_2500_10: And it wouldn’t really solve anything either.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_2600_10: That’s why I’m not telling anyone yet.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_2700_10: I haven’t given up on trying to change your mind.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_2900_10:
But if you ever try to hurt anyone on Pasio, I’ll
stop you.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_3000_10: Oho, so you’re placing some trust in me, then?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_3100_10: I do hope you don’t regret it.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_3400_10:
Oh, you’re the guy with the International Police...
Paulo?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_3800_10:
You’re going to tell Looker and the others,
aren’t you?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_4300_10:
Whatever his beliefs are, we don’t know that Volo
has done anything wrong on Pasio so far.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_4500_10:
I don’t think using power to eliminate wrongdoers
will really stop bad things from happening.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_4600_10: I want to support you and your choices.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_4700_10:
And I bet Looker and the others would say
the same.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_4900_10:
By the way, do the others from Hisui know about
Volo’s true motives?
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_5000_10: Yeah, a few of them do...
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_5200_10:
That means only a handful of people are aware of
the situation and could help if you needed it.
story_stone_07_01000/2401_1201_5300_10:
So if there’s anything I can do, let me know, OK?
I’ll help as much as I can!
